com.superduckinvaders.game.entity

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Entity
      • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mob, Player

    public abstract class Character
extends Entity
    Represents a character in the game.

      • isSwimming

        protected boolean isSwimming
        whether or not the character is swimming

      • facing

        protected int facing
        The direction the Character is facing.

      • stateTime

        protected float stateTime
        The state time for the animation. Set to 0 for not moving.

        protected int maximumHealth
        Current health and the maximum health of this Character.

        protected int currentHealth
        Current health and the maximum health of this Character.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(Round parent,
                 double x,
                 double y,
                 int maximumHealth)
        Initialises this Character.
        Parameters:
        parent - the round this Character belongs to
        x - the initial x coordinate
        y - the initial y coordinate
        maximumHealth - the maximum (and initial) health of this Character

        the direction this Character is facing (one of the FACING_ constants in TextureSet)

      • heal

        public void heal(int health)
        Heals this Character's current health by the specified number of points.
        Parameters:
        health - the number of health points to heal

      • damage

        public void damage(int health)
        Damages this Character's health by the specified number of points.
        Parameters:
        health - the number of points to damage

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Returns if the character is dead
        Returns:
        whether this Character is dead (i.e. its health is 0)

      • fireAt

        protected void fireAt(double x,
                      double y,
                      int speed,
                      int damage)
        Causes this Character to fire a projectile at the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - the target x coordinate
        y - the target y coordinate
        speed - how fast the projectile moves
        damage - how much damage the projectile deals

      • melee

        protected void melee(double range,
                     int damage)
        Causes this Character to use a melee attack.
        Parameters:
        range - how far the attack reaches in pixels
        damage - how much damage the attack deals

      • checkSwimming

        public void checkSwimming()
        checks whether the character is swimming and sets isSwimming appropriately

        Updates the state of this Character.
        Overrides:
        update in class Entity
        Parameters:
        delta - how much time has passed since the last update
